title: 005 - Bob Smiley - Frugality, Clydesdales, and Coughing Pomeranians
description:
In this episode, Tim and Bob talk Beach Body workouts, "marrying ketchups", and how to get free tube socks on the road. Bob gets a deal on a $12 microphone and fashions his own shower curtain rings. Also Tim's son, Levi Hawkins, channels his inner "rich kid".
 Get more of Bob at: http://bobsmiley.com/
 On twitter: @bobsmileycomic
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: How dare you!
